spec_data.Name: perl-Sys-Detect-Virtualization
spec_data.Description:
This module attempts to detect whether or not a system is running as a
guest under virtualization, using various heuristics.

spec_data.Summary: Library to detect if a UNIX system is running as a virtual machine
